VersionHistory.name: Verbalizer
VersionHistory.Version: - initial - implement base application with docker and flask - add templates and static files
- implement stable connection to postgre server - display all queries on sample-query file
- add password file for connecting to postgre
- implement input query textarea and submit button
- add static class log manager for logging application in file - make sql manager a static class with static methods
- add version history xml file for tracking version and application changes - display latest version at footer of page

- implemet requests with ajax and flask without loading whole page - add query method that recieves POST requests from ajax - implemet SPARQLEndpointManager that sends queries to an endpoint and recieves json results - display query result on answer-query template
- fix sample queris list - fix footer styles - fix page styles - add placeholder to input textarea - fix merge conflicts
- add sample queries with labels on database - display random sample queries labels on main page - fix sample queries list styles - resolve merge conflicts

- add postrequest method on app.py for query, label and sample posts - fix GetRandomLabels on SQLManager - add GetSpecificQuery on SQLManager - inplement post methods with ajax for getting specific query and random sample labels - add shuffle button on sample query area - add styles to answer area
- fix styles on footer and header title

- add DictCCManager for contacting dict.cc - add SPARQLParserManager for parsing query and extracting important information - add SplitTextManager for spliting text without spaces e.g. predicates or compound words - add VerbalizeManager to verbalize the answer of query (only for objects queries for now) - add word dictionary for the ontology (helping to split predicates) - use ngrams_probs model for predicting compound words

- delete PostgreSQLManager - read queries from xml file, extent XMLManager to read queries and labels - implemet mathods to query type and label on SPARQLEndpointManager - refactor part of code on whole app
